summary: Comprehensive testing of Talent Pool feature for UpShift CV platform. All 17 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI testing completed successfully for Admin, Reseller, and Public pages.
seed_data_creation: Test candidates created and cleaned up during backend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Talent Pool feature fully tested. Backend APIs working correctly with proper authentication. Frontend pages (Admin, Reseller, Public) all loading and functioning as expected. Pricing displays correctly in Rands (R999, R2,499, R7,999). Subscribe button redirects unauthenticated users to login.

public_endpoints.GET /api/talent-pool/experience-levels: PASS - Returns 4 levels (entry, mid, senior, executive)
public_endpoints.GET /api/talent-pool/recruiter/plans: PASS - Returns 3 plans with correct pricing (R999, R2499, R7999)

admin_endpoints.GET /api/talent-pool/admin/candidates: PASS - Returns candidates list with auth
admin_endpoints.GET /api/talent-pool/admin/pricing: PASS - Returns pricing config with auth

frontend_pages.Public Talent Pool (/talent-pool): PASS - Hero section, subscription plans, pricing displayed correctly
frontend_pages.Admin Talent Pool (/super-admin/talent-p: PASS - Candidates tab, Subscriptions tab, Pricing tab all working
frontend_pages.Reseller Talent Pool (/reseller-dashboar: PASS - All tabs and functionality working
frontend_pages.Add Candidate Modal: PASS - All form fields present and functional
frontend_pages.Subscribe Button Redirect: PASS - Redirects unauthenticated users to login

features_verified: Admin Talent Pool page loads correctly at /super-admin/talent-pool
Admin can view candidates list with status badges (Pending, Approved, Rejected, Visible)
Admin can filter candidates by status and industry
Admin can add new candidate manually via modal
Public Talent Pool page shows subscription plans at /talent-pool
Pricing displays correctly in Rands (R999, R2,499, R7,999)
Subscribe button redirects unauthenticated users to login
Reseller Talent Pool page exists at /reseller-dashboard/talent-pool
